title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions:
**Unlock the World of Engineering with the Award-Winning Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering Kit**

Become the architect of your dreams and explore the fascinating world of structural engineering with the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers kit. As a winner of the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award, this comprehensive kit is designed to ignite your curiosity and challenge your creativity.

With 285 pieces and 36 pages of illustrated instructions, you'll embark on a series of 20 model-building experiments that delve into the intricacies of mechanical physics, structural engineering, and the strength and stability of structures. Learn about the fundamental forces of tension, compression, shear, and bending, and how they impact the design and construction of iconic bridges and skyscrapers.

**Build and Explore 20 Different Models**

From truss bridges to arch bridges, cantilever bridges to rope bridges, and suspension bridges to skyscrapers, this kit offers a diverse range of models to build and explore. Discover the unique characteristics of each structural element, including columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary curves.

**Develop Essential Skills in Science and Engineering**

With this kit, you'll develop a deep understanding of the principles that govern the world of engineering. Learn about:

* The strength and stability of structures
* The strength and stiffness of materials
* Optimization for safety and cost
* Mechanical physics and structural engineering

**Perfect for Curious Minds**

The Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering kit is designed for intermediate learners, making it an ideal choice for students, hobbyists, and anyone fascinated by the world of engineering. With its comprehensive instructions and engaging experiments, you'll be challenged to think creatively and develop essential problem-solving skills.

**Join the Ranks of Award-Winning Engineers**

Don't miss out on this opportunity to unlock your full potential and become a master builder. Order the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers kit today and discover the thrill of creating and exploring the world of engineering.
